mapper.sql: id, name, sn, model_number, status, use_status, net_type, version, ip, port, mac, manufacturer, install_place, `describe`, create_time, update_time, output_power, current_type
mapper.insert: insert into iot_charging_point (id, name, sn, model_number, status, use_status, net_type, version, ip, port, mac, manufacturer, install_place, `describe`, create_time, update_time, output_power, current_type ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{netType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{installPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outputPower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into iot_charging_point
id,
name,
sn,
model_number,
status,
use_status,
net_type,
version,
ip,
port,
mac,
manufacturer,
install_place,
`describe`,
create_time,
update_time,
output_power,
current_type,

#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update iot_charging_point
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_number = #{modelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
net_type = #{netType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
install_place = #{installPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
output_power = #{outputPower,jdbcType=INTEGER},
current_type = #{currentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update iot_charging_point set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_number = #{modelNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_status = #{useStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, net_type = #{netType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, install_place = #{installPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, output_power = #{outputPower,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_type = #{currentType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT charging_point.id, charging_point.name, charging_point.sn, area_rel.province_id, area_rel.province_name, area_rel.city_id, area_rel.city_name, area_rel.district_id, area_rel.district_name, road.id road_id, road.road_name, charging_point.net_type, charging_point.version, charging_point.model_number, t.streetlight_name, charging_point.status, charging_point.install_place, charging_point.manufacturer FROM iot_charging_point charging_point LEFT JOIN ( SELECT streetlight_install_dev_rel.dev_id, streetlight.name streetlight_name, streetlight.area_rel_id, streetlight.road_id FROM iot_streetlight_install_dev_rel streetlight_install_dev_rel, iot_streetlight streetlight WHERE streetlight.status != ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DATA_STATUS_OF_DELETE} AND streetlight_install_dev_rel.status = ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DATA_STATUS_OF_NORMAL} AND streetlight_install_dev_rel.dev_type = ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@STREET_LIGHT_DEV_TYPE_OF_CHARGING_POINT} AND streetlight.id = streetlight_install_dev_rel.streetlight_id ) t ON t.dev_id = charging_point.id LEFT JOIN iot_area_rel area_rel ON area_rel.id = t.area_rel_id AND area_rel.status = ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DATA_STATUS_OF_NORMAL} LEFT JOIN iot_area_city_road road ON road.id = t.road_id WHERE charging_point.status != ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DATA_STATUS_OF_DELETE} AND charging_point.id = #{chargingPointId}

SELECT t1.*, t1.id dev_id, ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@STREET_LIGHT_DEV_TYPE_OF_CHARGING_POINT} dev_type FROM ( SELECT charging_point.* FROM iot_charging_point charging_point WHERE charging_point.status != ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DEVICE_STATUS_OF_DELETE} ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT charging_point.* FROM iot_charging_point charging_point LEFT JOIN iot_streetlight_install_dev_rel install_dev_rel ON install_dev_rel.status = ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DATA_STATUS_OF_NORMAL} AND install_dev_rel.dev_type = ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@STREET_LIGHT_DEV_TYPE_OF_CHARGING_POINT} WHERE charging_point.status != ${@com.rz.iot.think.utils.RzIotDBConstParam@DEVICE_STATUS_OF_DELETE} AND charging_point.id = install_dev_rel.dev_id ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.id WHERE t2.id IS NULL
